## Data Economy {.smaller}

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width=50%}
### Commercially available data...

- Location
    - Cell phone
    - Vehicle telemetry
    - Children's schools

- Financial
    - Credit Card Purchases, Debt
    - Gambling, Sensitive Purchases

- Biometric
    - Facial Recognition, DNA
    - Medications, Vulnerabilities

- Social Relationships
    - Family, Friends
    - Therapists
    - Doctors
:::
::: {.column width=50%}
### compromises mission readiness!

- Troop movements
    - Out-of-band traffic patterns
    - Absence of expected traffic
    - Change in shopping/vehicle/cell phone patterns

- Unit capabilities
    - Equipment (social media posts)
    - Operators (facial recognition/cell phone metadata)
    - Logistics bottlenecks
    - Supply chain bottlenecks

- Unit plans
    - Training maneuvers, tactics
    - Troop build ups, deployments
:::
::::

## Protect your Email {timing=120}

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width=60%}
- Keys to the kingdom!
- Use a very unique password
- Multi-factor authentication!!
- Separate emails for different purposes
- Use encrypted email when possible
    - [ProtonMail](https://proton.me/mail)
- Email anonymizers
    - [Firefox Relay](https://relay.firefox.com/)
    - [DuckDuckGo Email Protection](https://duckduckgo.com/email/)
- Ref: [xkcd.com/2139](https://xkcd.com/2139/)
:::
::: {.column width=20%}
![](https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/email_settings.png){width="100%"}
:::
::::

## In-Class Exercise: Tools {timing=600}
